Pitchblend is a highly specialized digital PR/brand communications agency sought-after by the globe's most forward-thinking brands for our cultural vision, comms innovation, visual aesthetics and expertise of next-generation audiences.

Who we are: Pitchblend is a highly specialized digital PR/brand communications agency sought-after by the globe's most forward-thinking brands for our cultural vision, comms innovation, visual aesthetics and expertise of next-generation audiences.

Who you are: You’ve got a passion for Public Relations which is evident by your enthusiasm for the latest trends and innovations in the PR and media landscape. Candidates must have background and be an authentic participant of niche/sub communities within culture ranging from premium & luxury street and sportswear + sneaker culture, emerging public and contemporary art, DJ/festival culture, emerging rap/hip-hop, dance, indie rock, Pro sports (basketball, soccer), action sports (street skating), outdoor sports (hiking, trail running, mountaineering), consumer technology, emerging media and mass media.

What you’ll be doing: You would play a pivotal role in working closely with agency leadership to drive maximal results for our clients. Your primary responsibilities include, but aren’t limited to, media research and building/expansion of media and influencer lists, assistance with media outreach, as well as coordination of media announcements, interviews, gifting and more. As a coordinator you will be drafting press releases, alerts and pitching to the media. On site presence for media events and activations will be required.

Must haves:
● Unique personal style/fashion sense
● BS/BA in Public Relations, Communications of similar relevant field
● Previous internship experience in a PR agency
● Advanced writing and verbal skills
● Near flawless organizational and project management skills
● Near encyclopedic and most-up-to-date knowledge of the mass media including social-first editorial and niche mags
● Fluency of the creator/influencer space and strategic partnerships
● Fluency in Google and/or MS spreadsheets applications
● Fluency in Google Slides and/or Powerpoint
● Expertise of TikTok, Instagram, Linkedin as an active user + continuously networking through these platforms
● Above & beyond work ethic and desire to do whatever it takes

Compensation and Benefits
● Salary range $40-55K BOE
● Paid Holidays
● Paid Time off
● Sick Leave
● Comp Time
● Medical, Dental, Vision insurance
● 401(k) 

To Apply: Please send your resume to sonia@pitchblend.com.
